name: Explosion Jumper (Misdirection Studios)
description:
A short and simple game where you use explosions to launch yourself through the levels.

WASD to move, Spacebar to jump, left click to shoot, right click to manually detonate projectiles and R to change projectile type. Escape/P to pause/access settings/access other levels.

There are two puzzles and a sandbox level (which you start in) where you can mess around with the mechanics.

This game was made for "GAMES MADE QUICK??? FOUR".
